biocontainers.name: reprof
biocontainers.summary: Protein secondary structure and accessibility predictor from the rost lab. prediction is either done from protein sequence alone or from an alignment - the latter should be used for optimal performance. the language choosen was perl.

biotools.summary: Protein secondary structure and accessibility predictor from the Rost Lab. Prediction is either done from protein sequence alone or from an alignment - the latter should be used for optimal performance. The language choosen was Perl.
